name: Edge of the World
description:
You have to bring this last letter to destination, even if the world is changing and reaching its end.

Controls:

- Move: wasd

- Quit: echap

We created this game during Villa Kujoyama Game Jam. The themes were CONTACT and EDGES. We merged the idea of reaching the end of the world and the idea of trying to bring a message in a desolated environnement. As it was a mini jam of 8h, we cuted some ideas, like the survival part, with a stamina bar for resisting cold,  having several houses where you have to find the right person the letter is destined to and could rest. Those are ideas where the prototype could evolve. We were inspired by Terranigma for the setting.
